message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to me, but considering its immense worth to you, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive price. I trust that you'll find this offer irresistible and beneficial for your endeavors. Let's make this deal happen!
